## Carregando as bibliotecas



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library("ggplot2")
library("dplyr")
library("gapminder")
```
:::



\newpage

## Cores por continente


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gap_07 <- filter(gapminder, year == 2007)
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp,
                   color = continent)) +
  geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/cores-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage
## Usando formas e cores diferentes 


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp,
                   shape = continent, color = continent)) +
  geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/forma-cores-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage
## Cores e tamanho


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp,
                   size = pop, color = continent)) +
  geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/cores-tamanho-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Sumario dos dados para obter pop média por continente


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gap_pop <- gapminder %>% 
  group_by(continent, year) %>% 
  summarize(pop = mean(pop))
head(gap_pop)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 6 × 3
# Groups:   continent [1]
  continent  year      pop
  <fct>     <int>    <dbl>
1 Africa     1952 4570010.
2 Africa     1957 5093033.
3 Africa     1962 5702247.
4 Africa     1967 6447875.
5 Africa     1972 7305376.
6 Africa     1977 8328097.
```
:::
:::



\newpage

## Grafico de linha com cores



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_pop, aes(x = year, y = pop, color = continent)) +
  geom_line() + geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/cores-linhas-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


\newpage

##  Criando grids entre os anos de 2002 e 2007


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gap_0207 <- gapminder %>% filter(between(year, 2002, 2007))
ggplot(gap_0207, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(continent ~ year)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/grids-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


\newpage

## Outro tipo de apresentações de grid


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gap_life <- gapminder %>% 
  group_by(continent, year) %>% 
  summarize(lifeExp = mean(lifeExp))

ggplot(gap_life, aes(x = year, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_grid(continent ~ .)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/multiplas-linhas-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Grid em outra direção


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_life, aes(x = year, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_grid(. ~ continent)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/multiplas-colunas-1.png){width=864}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Usando o wrap


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_life, aes(x = year, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap( ~ continent)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/wrapped-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


\newpage

## Filtrando dados e fazendo grafico de dispersão padrão



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gap_07 <- filter(gapminder, year == 2007)
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/graf-dispersao-pad-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Transformando o eixo x para escala logarítimica


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_continuous(trans = "log10")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/escala-log-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Outra forma de transformação do eixo x


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/outra-escala-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Definindo limites para o eixo y


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 95))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/limites-eixoy-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage


## Grafico com cores normais

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/cores-normais-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Grafico usando outra paleta de cores


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/cores-outras-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Usando codigos manuais para as cores


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#FF0000", "#00A08A", "#F2AD00",
                                "#F98400", "#5BBCD6"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/codigos-cores-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Definindo as cores e tamanho dos pontos


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point(color = "darkblue", size = 3) +
  scale_x_log10()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/cores_tamanho-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Customizando títulos, rótulos de eixo e legendas


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/legenda_baixo-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Sem legenda


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/sem_legenda-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Legenda dentro do gráfico


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = c(0.1, 0.85))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/legenda_dentro-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Salvando o gráfico


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
graf1 <- ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = c(0.1, 0.85))

graf1
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/salvando_grafico-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



\newpage

## Aumentando o tamanho do texto e mudando para portugues


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
graf2 <- ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = c(0.1, 0.80),
        legend.key = element_blank(),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 12),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 14)) +
  labs(x = "PIB Per capita (US$)", 
       y = "Expectativa de Vida (anos)", 
       title = "Expectativa de Vida vs PIB em 2007",
       color = "Continente")

graf2
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula04/mudando_texto-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
